dialogue: With no milk or sugar, right?
Good job, [name]. The only thing that would've made this better is if you'd managed to do it without me needing to hold your hand all the while.
I'm glad you like it, sir.
Of course, I'd still like a coffee before the day ends.
I'll see what I can do, sir.
But in the meantime, this is exactly what I like to intake while I output.
I watch as the boss enthusiastically finishes inside Emma, sipping his tea all the while.
This is the weirdest job I've ever had.
